original_title: 旦那に肉体接待を強要された巨乳若女将 死ぬほど大嫌いな男たちに朝まで何度もイカされて… JULIA
overview: "Your wife is lewd." The couple who runs a long-established inn borrowed money from a bad financial company due to financial difficulties, and interest payments were delayed. And the husband succumbs to the threat of "let's make a chara with the physical entertainment of the young landlady". Unequaled men rush to the inn with their beloved wife and roll up from morning till night with all-you-can-eat. In the end, when I made a squid in front of my husband and ate up the tits, I fell into pleasure that I could not refuse in despair.
title: This Young, Big Tittied Landlady Takes Up Sex Work To Please Her Husband, And Cums Until Morning With Guys She Hates
